name: Scribblenauts™ Unlimited
description: Take your imagination on a wild ride in Scribblenauts Unlimited on Wii U. Explore a huge side-scrolling open world filled with robust puzzles, and solve them using the most powerful tool in Maxwell’s universe: your imagination! Step into a high-definition hand-drawn world and crack hundreds of brain-teasing challenges using anything you can think of. If you need to climb a tree, simply type in “ladder” using the Wii U GamePad’s touch screen, and watch as the item appears right away. Be more adventurous and try out a grappling hook, jet pack, or any other inventive solution that pops into your head! And with the object editor, players can customise their creations and share them online with other players!
